name: Georgina and the End of the World
name_original: Georgina and the End of the World
description:
Ludum Dare 48: 'Deeper and Deeper'
Deeper into the tree, and an insectoid emotional journey

Start on Title Page, and move down the page to start game.

Hit Space-bar to hear the next bit and make the next leaf appear

It's still buggy :(

----------------------------

Georgina enjoyed her summer, eating leaves and exploring her forest. As the season deepens into autumn, she uncovers fears for her future. She seeks safety, and yet her struggle continues. Once she bolsters her resolve, she discovers a life with deeper beauty than she thought possible.

“What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.”

                         ― Richard Bach, Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

Use ASWD or arrow keys to move, and Spacebar to get the next sounds.

Art: Draconimous and Keravon
Voice: Enjaku
Coding: Rainsong
